content: halloweenies by cilla webb yarn 20g sirdar snuggly dk yarn per voodoo doll a small amount of red yarn for the details needles 3 5mm straight needles other supplies toy stuffing tapestry needle 4 mm toy safety eyes small buttons black embroidery thread size 12 cm tall abbreviations x times knit the instructions between the brackets x amount of times * repeat from * to end repeat the instructions between the * and until the end of the row st s stitch es k knit if followed by a number knit that amount of stitches p purl st st stocking stitch alternate a row of knitting and a row of purling g st garter stitch knit every row k2tog knit two stitches together knitwise p2tog purl two stitches together purlwise kfb knit in the front and back of the stitch creating an increase © copyright 2021 cilla webb - cilla s purls autumn is such a magical time of the year it washes away the last remnants of summer with plenty of cold wet showers and brings along the promise of chilly winter nights snuggled under blankets with a cup of hot chocolate but before we reach the depths of winter there s halloween as a child growing up in belgium it wasn t really celebrated so now i take every opportunity to carve pumpkins and make pumpkin pie and take my boys trick or treating while they still love to dress up © copyright 2021 cilla webb - cilla s purls head and body using your chosen colour cast on 8 sts row 1 kfb 8 times 16 sts row 2 and all even row p row 3 k1 kfb 8 times 24 sts row 5 k1 kfb k1 8 times 32 sts row 7 k2 kfb k1 8 times 40 sts row 9 k2 kfb k2 8 times 48 sts row 10-20 st st 11 row row 21 k2 k2tog k2 8 times 40 sts row 23 k2 k2tog k1 8 times 32 sts row 25 k1 k2tog k1 8 times 24 sts row 27 k1 k2tog 8 times 16 sts row 29 k1 kfb 8 times 24 sts row 31 k1 kfb k1 8 times 32 sts row 33 k2 kfb k1 8 times 40 sts row 34-42 st st 9 row row 43 k2 k2tog k1 4 times leaving the rem 20 sts waiting 16 sts row 45 k1 k2tog k1 4 times 12 sts row 47 k1 k2tog 4 times 8 sts break yarn and thread through rem sts pull tight and fasten join yarn to the rem 20 sts and repeat row 43-47 using mattress sts sew along the side seam of each leg and then along the back of the body and head and stuff secure eyes by adding either buttons or toy safety eyes embroider some stitches for the smile and body markings or embroider some love hearts © copyright 2021 cilla webb -
